Welcome to [R 2 Phoenix]()! This site is dedicated to analyzing data from the [City of Phoenix](https://www.phoenix.gov/) open [data](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/) portal.

[City of Phoenix](https://www.phoenix.gov/) open [data](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/) portal? It is a repository for data that the city collects and makes available. As of last check, there were over 50 datasets available. The site is well organized, so I would encourage you to open an new tab and check it out. The site has a [tips](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/pages/tips) page with a good intro to site navigation and how it is maintained.  

*This* site uses the data from the [data portal](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/) to examine various questions (see below). **Enjoy!**


<br>

#### [What's going on with crime in Phoenix?](https://jacobtnyoung.github.io/R2PhX/projects/PHXcrime.html)

This pages analyzes the [Phoenix crime data](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/dataset/crime-data) file to demonstrate how to work with the file as well as examine current trends in crime in Phoenix.  


<br>


#### [Did crime increase or decrease after COVID-19?]()

So what do you think? Did crime go up or down (or stay the same) during the pandemic? This pages analyzes the [Phoenix crime data](https://www.phoenixopendata.com/dataset/crime-data) file see how crime changed along with the shutdown of services in Phoenix as a consequence of COVID-19.
